title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: NoneIntroduction to Law and Economics: Overview of the common law system, Efficiency versus Distribution; Regulation and Public Choice; Coarse Theorem: The problem of social cost; Economic Theories of Property Law, Contract Law, Corporate Law; Competition Law, Tort and Insurance Law, Tax Law, Environmental Law, Trade Law, Labour Law, Crime and Punishment, and Family Law.
